mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_SHOULDER_PRESS (NUM, REGIST_DATE, USER_NUM) VALUES(NEXTVAL('SEQ_SHOULDER_PRESS'), now(), #{userNum})
mapper.select: SELECT REGIST_DATE, USER_NUM, STATUS, AREA_NAME FROM TBL_SHOULDER_PRESS WHERE USER_NUM=#{userNum} AND REGIST_DATE=TO_DATE(#{registDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')
